description:
exp/html: simplify testing code

Now that the parser passes all tests in the test suite,
it is no longer necessary to keep track of which tests
pass and which don't. So remove the testlogs directory
and the code that uses it.

messages.text:
Hello nigeltao@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM.

Submitting...

http://codereview.appspot.com/6453124/diff/1002/src/pkg/exp/html/parse_test.go
File src/pkg/exp/html/parse_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6453124/diff/1002/src/pkg/exp/html/parse_test.go#newcode24
src/pkg/exp/html/parse_test.go:24: var updateLogs = flag.Bool("update-logs", false, "Update the log files that show the test results")
You can delete this too.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=492eb9a6a63b ***

exp/html: simplify testing code

Now that the parser passes all tests in the test suite,
it is no longer necessary to keep track of which tests
pass and which don't. So remove the testlogs directory
and the code that uses it.

CC=golang-dev
